title: ICYMI - America Ferrera on Standing with Christine Blasey Ford and Reclaiming American Identity
itunes:title: ICYMI - America Ferrera on Standing with Christine Blasey Ford and Reclaiming American Identity
description:
Actor America Ferrera describes her reaction to Christine Blasey Ford's treatment before the Senate Judiciary Committee and talks about her book "American Like Me." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
